content.detailedDescription: Outside of work place taking a break about midnight or later no sure of time.  i saw a bright light moving up and down and then side  to side  in a zig zag motion. i watched this for about 20 minutes then it blinked out. this light was ne of moon  made the hair stand up on my neck just watching it. light was below tree line by at least a quarter of  tree height.  believe the light was red and yellow more red on top than yellow on the bottom. then as i watched it, it blinked and was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White light in the  northeast sky. moving in  different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i saw these lights on the way home the other night.  craziest thing i have ever witnessed, and was lucky enough to record the event on my cell phone!  video speaks for itself...

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking through our neighborhood just after sunset, around 8:05 or so. sunlight was still illuminating the sky and cast some orange borders on wispy clouds. i'll admit that we had been drinking and were not actually sober. but we saw the same thing, mostly.

i looked up at what i thought was a drone. it looked about the size of one of the professional drones that are 3 feet wide. it was hovering overhead, about 30 feet above the roof top of a house off of se gladstone st between se 27th and se 28th ave.

as i looked closer for drone propellers i realized it was slowly turning upside down. it was thin like a deflated mylar balloon. to my wife it also looked thin but she saw a glowing red diamond shape, like a kite but glowing like a flame. i saw a black, amorphous object with four or so red lights shining out of it. the red lights appeared to flash randomly as though they were just reflecting off of a red metallic surface as the object rotated. this was past sunset though, so i don't know where such a bright, direct light would've been coming from.

i then noticed that the object was fluttering like a flat weightless ash rising out of a fire. after it turned upside down it's right side rose, then it wobbled so it's left side rose like the random movements of a falling piece of paper. but it wasn't falling. my wife saw this movement too. 

we both saw it pick up velocity in the southbound direction and leave the area quite swiftly. i believe it went in a straight line about 60-80 feet above the ground. the fluttering movements didn't speed up or change. they remained graceful and almost care free as we watched it travel at a constant altitude over the roof tops. since it wasn't very high we couldn't track it for long. houses and trees soon obstructed our view. it was surprising how much distance it gained so quickly. i was wondering if it was getting smaller or just further away because it covered a lot of ground in little time. the fluttering motion didn't make sense either because nothing i know could flutter so peacefully at such a rate of acceleration.  

if i was to force known physics onto this thing i would say it was a mylar balloon suddenly caught in a super strong wind pattern that swept it away. but the air was still that night. the tree tops were still. it was a warm, sunny summer day with a calm beautiful dusk.
content.summary: Red-flashing black and red object hovered overhead then fluttered away quite swiftly

content.detailedDescription:
Wife was cleaning up supper dishes and she frantically called me to the kitchen to look out the window - over the lake (our kitchen - bay window is only 30' from the lake). we observed a small (?) greenish 'light' hovering directly to the east - at an unknown distance but at maybe @ 22 degees - over eastern hazelton or western wealthwood township - nominally 2 - 6 miles.
 it made some movements and after a minute or two traveled at a speed greater than any aircraft we know to the north. we then both ran outside and onto our dock. still visible (at about the same unknown distance)it traveled to a northerly point and stopped, hovered a minute and then zipped back near it's original position. at which point it went straight up ... about an additional 10 - 20 degrees. it then descended back down, moved towards the south - then east until out of sight.
 no sound. very unusual. the speed, and ability to make quick, 90 degree turns - we have never seen anything close to these.
 total time witnessed was about 5 - 8 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Greenish light that hovered and almost 'darted'. east, then traveled north then back east  then elevated , descended then south to se and faded to e.

content.detailedDescription: I was recording how beautiful the sky was.  i felt chipper and so i recorded a few moments of sky.  as i reviewed my recording i noticed a bright area of cloud that seem to spout a fast moving spinning shinning brilliantly dazzling white object into the atmosphere.  i have slow it down as much as i can and am posting a few of the snapshots here.
content.summary: Some sort of spinning spiraling craft seemed to appear as if thru a wormhole!

content.detailedDescription: went outside to dump trash notice the blinking lights flying from the south at a very high altitude then when they came back went back inside… came back outside to smoke a cigarette about 5 to 10 minutes later the craft had circled around  and was heading back south flying at a much lower altitude… the video was shot on an iphone so you should be able to blow it up with my eye i could see that it was a triangle .  i shot this video while i was outside smoking a cigarette .
content.summary: this thing flew by me from the south.Made a loop and went back to the south… if you can blow up the video i could see it as a triangle

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was 10 my sister was 13,was watching family matters with sister, light brighter then the sun came threw the window above the the t.V., the light felt like it scanned the whole house,when the beam left out the house it felt like it took everything with it like it snatched my soul and left my body, i was sitting on the recliner seat closes to the door my sister was sitting on the sofa by the back of the trailer, she said to me gabriel what was that, i got up and locked the dead bolt lock on the trailer, and sat down, my sister then said you a punk, got up and unlocked the door,when she looked out the door, she looked up and said gabriel look, i got out the chair , crawled on my knees and when i got to the door,i stayed on my knees the whole time on the left side of my sister, i looked up and what i saw was the most beautifulest theing i ever scene in my life, right above the tree top i saw a triangular object just hovering over our house,except it didnt have points instead it was rounded at the points, thier was a very bright whiteish orange light in the middle and around the edges of this craft bottom their were little lights going around the triangle but they were all different colors every color in the spectrum , the way they moved around each one changed color and had a hypnotizing effect, the moon was out that night,and the whole craft had a bluish hue,and looked like it was made out of star dust, and no matter how good technolgy gets or special effects i've never scene nothing similar to this but i could say it looks like something that came out of a sci-fi movei but this was better then the movies the cant duplicate this, and this was in the early 90's, the last thing we remebered is that the craft slowly started to move of, and then we lost time when we woke up we where both back in are seats and we both popped up in our seats and said what was that,we where alone that night , the next morning my mom came home we told her, people around the trailer park said they seen something similar but not a similar story of abduction, i feel we were taken because we lost time, but i would like to get hypnotized to find out the truth. a few years back i had a dream i was on a craft and i was in like a hospital bed , when igot up a looked around i scene more beds amd wierd creatures walking around ,so i ran and i got to an elevator, i got on and went down and when the doors open they were waiting for me and i woke up , i wonder if that was trying to open those memories, but this is real my sisters my witness.
content.summary: A beam of light shined threw the window, beam scanned the house, sucked everything out the house when it left,

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along 95 south and nevada highway, when a ufo flew across the road, it was so close i was about to hit it with my car. i swerved off the road and the guy(never caught his name) that was behind me pulled over to see if i'm alright when i got out of my car, a jet fighter with two black helicopters where following the ufo. the object suddenly did a 90' turn up then a second one back east. the jet and the helicopters made there way back that way. after about an hour of settling down, a unmarked suv came up on us. the four guys then asked if we saw anything, the older gentleman and i said yes and relayed what we saw, the lead then told us: we didn't see a thing and that this never happened.
content.summary: Ufo flew across the highway causing me and one other person to serve off and stop.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was driving a rental car, a camaro.  as you can see in the 3 pictures, i was taking a picture with my iphone while driving, because i was trying to capture the holographic odometer display on the windshield. i took 3 pictures.  the first at 11:01am, which didn't contain the object.  and then the next 2 at at 11:02am, which contained the object.  it appears to have moved from left to right.  picture quality from the untrained eye is poor, and thus from my perspective could be anything...Bird, plane, ufo.  i don't know where that cloud that streaks across the sky came from.

i never saw or noticed the object at the time i was taking the picture.  i was focused on driving and taking the picture of the odometer.

as lack as the evidence is, i'm only submitting this as possibly to a trained expert, this maybe more significant than i thought.
content.summary: I never saw the ufo with my own eyes.  i only noticed the ufo in my iphone pictures a few months after the incident.

content.detailedDescription: I have a new canon with a 300mm zoom lens and have been watching (3) star like ufo's in the sw sky in the evening and one similar due west. all are visible at the same time at the same elevation. when reviewing the photo's, these ufo's appear to have a network of glowing symmetrical white light orbs somehow held together and moving in diverse patterns. there is usually one with all colored orbs, but still symmetrical. on the evening of 8-22-16, one photo (when enhanced or blown up shows the orbs with what appears to be a face of something that appears to look like the face of a grey alien or something similar. i have witnessed the same basic ufo's on clean nights.
content.summary: Three pulsing star like ufo's in sw sky. one in west sky approximately same distance.

content.detailedDescription: I have a new canon with a 300mm zoom lens and have been watching (3) star like ufo's in the sw sky in the evening and one similar due west. all are visible at the same time at the same elevation. when reviewing the photo's, these ufo's appear to have a network of glowing symmetrical white light orbs somehow held together and moving in diverse patterns. there is usually one with all colored orbs, but still symmetrical. on the evening of 8-22-16, one photo (when enhanced or blown up shows the orbs with what appears to be a face of something that appears to look like the face of a grey alien or something similar. i have witnessed the same basic ufo's on clean nights.
content.summary: Three pulsing star like ufo's in sw sky. one in west sky approximately same distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking cloud pictures and saw the object up  in the sky .I thought it was a airplane but it appeared it wasnt moving . i took 3 pictures total of the object then went inside the house . showed my wife and she cropped the picture to look closer at the object and it looked shinny and vibrating and had little black dots on top and bottom ,, so she said to send it to your group to look closer and see what you think >
content.summary: shinny white object in sky

content.detailedDescription: Bright sunny day.  just had a barbecue with friends.  i was following some embers floating into the air when i noticed a jet high in the sky.  i looked at it wondering where it was going when i saw a small grey dot in the sky above it travelling in the opposite direction.  it was much higher and hard to see because it was so high.  it passed over the aircraft which was how o realised how high it was.  it was difficult to focus on because it was just so high.  it travelled in a dead straight line travelling 20 times faster than the plane was moving. it was grey with a dull reflected light.  it was approximately 10 times smaller than the aircraft but as it seemed substantially higher i would assume it was of a similar size.  the airplane was a passenger jet.  i thought it was the space station or something like that but it was the middle of the day and this is not possible.  another possibility was a satellite but i have since been told that only certain types can be seen during the day and that they seem to shine as they catch the light. it did not do this.
content.summary: Watching an aircraft at about 30k feet and saw this going in opposite direction well above it travelling at great speed.

content.detailedDescription: I got up to open one of the electronic gates to our property at 5 am. it was still very dark out side. i was looking out the kitchen window to make sure they opened. i notices across the street in front of the drive way of the house at the dead end next to the woods colored lights. i blinked because i couldn't believe what i was seeing. there were a cluster of lights in primary colors at the end of their drive way. not moving and i couldn't tell if it was huvering there or not. off the right next to the woods there were colored orbs moving around maybe 10 feet off the ground. also in primary colors. they looked like they were dancing in the air. the area went dark for about 30 seconds and then they started dancing again. i got scared and went back to bed and pulled the covers over my head. i can't explain what the heck i saw. nobody in the neighborhood was up or out side. very, very strange. we live on the lake side of the street. i was in shock and then got scared. my husband said why didn't you wake me up. i said you were the furthest thing from my mind. i was just mezmerized by what i saw. it never dawned on me to wake him up or even take a picture with my phone.
content.summary: Cluster of colored orbs together and off to the side dancing colored orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 1:50 pm on 8-29-16. i was working out of doors and noticed a turkey buzzard flying around and i noticed what i thought was a high airplane
going above....It was just a shinny dot and i told my husband it must be the
international space station reflecting off the son and then it did a fast
zig zag and was gone. it figured it must have went upwards because it was just gone.  i never seen a shape, just a bright dot. blue sky and clear at the time and after i told my husband it was gone some fluffy clouds rolled in. i went in the house and checked when the iss would be going over michigan
and it had to be around 2 pm.  a jet went over about 5 min's later like normal.....The gerald r ford national airport is not far away.  that's it.N
content.summary: It was just a reflective dot almost straight up-i thought it was the iss, then it did a zig zag and disapered

content.detailedDescription: Guys, i have always been a magnet to sightings and the supernatural. this one was filmed and even shows the alien move and cloak at the same time. i ran then. i had more experiences with the kind that have hair like the ones in the same picture. before i went to this spot to get exercise that my dr ordered due to my disabilities worsening, i felt like something was drawing me to go there. it is hard to explain. i have a lot of film that is really good and shows at least five beings. i have been followed ever since and i don't know what to do. before i found this place in the woods there was a lot of strange happenings in my house and my family members had encounters themselves. my daughter has told me of the classic abduction scenario. she said a skinny, grey, naked person touched her head with a stick when her mommy was holding her outside. my father and i then  had a class a encounter with a being in the house. it was fat and short and had a sort of hooded cape.This guy was definitely malevolent.The ones in this picture are benevolent. if they wanted to hurt me they could have.  all i can say is we are not alone and i believe these beings are inter-dimensional. i truly feel like i am in an episode of the x files. i hope someone will help answer my main question... has anyone seen the hairless being before?
content.summary: I saw these entities walking on a trail for exercise. there were two of the hairless ones that i observed for a couple minutes. i ran when it "cloak moved".

content.detailedDescription: Please help me and tell me are they back again me very afraid of them
content.summary: It's up my head

content.detailedDescription:
I heard and saw this craft fly in my direction from the north.  it approached and i saw it overhead directly and continue south.

please see sketch. 

it buzzed loud making sound like distant chainsaw.

altitude was over 500 feet above powerlines and 5 story buildings about threefold.

path was straight line.

it was daylight and sky was cloudless.  there were no windows on thin body and did not emit vapor.  the buzz sounded like propellers but the shadow or outline of them were not apparent.   dimensions were more than 50 feet in diameter and cannot determine width.  body was disc shaped parabolic not circular.  there were two sharp connical ends on underbelly as sketched.

extended from the disc were to braces and a flat rectangular metallic board.  please see sketch.

speed was less than a jet airliner (and there are many in the sky approaching macarthur airport) and about the same as a prop plane.

color was light metallic gray.   

my cellphone was charging and was not in my possession.
content.summary: Loud craft without wings or jets or emission heading south

content.detailedDescription: I have been walking with my friend to work, to thermo king factory, from tirellan heights to marvue business park. somewhere around sandy road next to galway motorpark i have observed three yellow-orange spheres which were hoowered over the distance buildings. i have pointed this to my colleague and he confirms he sees the same thing. when we tried to pick up our cell phones (back  then there was no smart phones) and activate camera to take a picture those objects dissapears. we stood shocked for few moments... and head back to the work. i was telling this story over and over again to my friends but no one seems to believe me (and my friend ofc).
content.summary: Three yellow - white spheres close to each other hovered on the sky and suddenly dissapear.

content.detailedDescription:
August 24 at 00:15hrs
this event lasted from 12:15 a.M. to 12:30 a.M.
i was in the backyard letting the dogs out at 12:15 a.M. under tree cover. turned around to walk back inside and saw red orange orb appear from behind a tree at a distance, flying at the height of a cesna on a horizontal path similar to a plane. it was silent. appeared to be an intelligent craft with a vibrating bubble on top. as soon as i comprehended this was not a plane since there were no faa lights, the orb accelerated with the orb/bubble leaning backwards with gforce (elongating) then returned to concentric bubble shape at higher speed. i dashed inside to get my fiance' - took about 15 seconds. he dashed outside with me and we both saw the orb shrink suddenly to a small red light, which then changed directions and sped away from us at high speed toward the horizon, disappearing as it descended and was hidden by trees in the distance. 
my cell phone was dead having been on all day at work. he didn't bring his phone because he doubted i was really seeing something but regretted it once in the backyard.
i went back in the house, grabbed my camera and jumped in the car to head north to the far end of the lake. about 10 min later i turned around and came back, couldn't find anything. as i turned the car around he called to tell me the object had returned but was staying at a distance and looked like a red light. 
the odd thing about the bubble/orb is that is vibrated and looked like it had an energy source inside that was vibrating like a tesla coil on the inside. the globe was translucent or frosted, concealing the light source inside. the light was darker reddish in the center and radiating out to be orange at the perimeter. the orb created a persistent ghost image as it moved. 
my fiance' remarked "now that was a real ufo." we are both familiar with aviation, astronomy and drones used for photography. this was not a drone. the lake is pitch dark at this time of night. 10 miles north is the beginning of the chickasaw indian territory at the red river. we have been watching every night for the last week and it has not returned.
content.summary: Silent orange orb size of cesna changing speed, shape and direction.

content.detailedDescription: I looked up to the night sky at 9 13 pm on august 25 and noticed what looked just like a star but it was moving fast and straight.  the light did not flash like the planes in the area did so i ran to the house to get my wife to come have a look.  she agreed that it didnt reemnle a shooting star, or an airplane and that it was very high in the sky just like a star i tried to get video of it but the objext couldnt be seen in the footage.  its flight path was east for about 30 seconds then it stopped moving east and seemed to lose elevation but still quite high like a star.  then it continued east faster than before until it dissappeared from sight
content.summary: Saw starlike light moving east very high in sky seemed higher than planes in area.  got my wife to come see it, it went straight east then seemed to slow or stop, losing elevation then continued east faster than before dissappearing from sight.

content.detailedDescription: it was light like a star
content.summary: Flew from nw to se in a random pattern it was light like a star

content.detailedDescription:
I was with friends at youbou bc on lake cowichan. i was standing on a ramp to the wharf when a noticed a really bright light across the lake just above the mountain to the west. i would estimate the distance about 2 miles away. i watched it for a minute, it was just sitting there not moving, then all of a sudden it shot to the left a distance of about 5 miles, stopped for a second then shot back to the original spot.
it moved this 5 miles in about 1 second. when it came back to the original spot it then,very slowly sunk into the trees on the mountain.
that was the last i saw of it.
content.summary: Extreme bright light, stationary, then moved approx 5 miles then back and dropped to ground

content.detailedDescription: I was stepping outside my door to meet my girlfriend who was pulling up to come over around 10:40 pm 8-28-2016. i noticed the first red orange light with zero hesitation i quickly call my parents stepping inside briefly to get their attention.I exit first and they followed behind me at that point i noticed 2 more light going east to west following the other single light that i first noticed.The first light i spotted was farther ahead of the other 2 and a slightly higher elevation,the second light in behind the main one was lower and then the third light higher then the second all with the same color red orange.All three were moving fairly quick and did not have the normal air plane lights that i commonly see.The first light was at some distance now and faded out the second light reached the area around the same distance and was still in view the third light behind the second dimmed out before the second light did a few moments later the second finally dimmed out i have never seen anything light this and i live close to airports that i know the difference between civilian air planes and military aircraft that may use afterburners
content.summary: 3 red orange lights with slight flicker

content.detailedDescription:
Was out taking pics of a plane flying around with a banner....On the last pic i noticed something over too of the plane...I enlarged that area and have never saw anything like this. .

pic taken in wichita falls tx
content.summary: Silver-reflecting sunlight-above small plane-no noise other than plane

content.detailedDescription: Seating in my back yard looking up at the blue sky watching the vapor trail of a commercial jet traveling from the west to the east. then from out of the blue appeared this object following the jet it appeared to come along side of the jet how close i do not know. then it flew straight ahead of the jet passing it at a tremendous rate of speed going east at the same elevation and it was gone from my sight in a matter of seconds. this is the first time in my 85 years on this earth that i have ever seen a ufo.
content.summary: An object in the sky traveling west to east

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting on the beach watching the waves as most couples like to do in the evening. when i noticed a red orb to our left moving from east to west. we first noticed it at abt 25 ft above the ground and it ascended to about 150ft. it disappeared behind the condo building and never reappeared. within minutes a second red orb appeared at the location we saw the first, and traveled in the same direction and disappeared just as the first one did....The red orbs made no sound, nor did they change color or flash. we jokingly laughed it off as u.F.O.'s. then within 5 minutes my girlfriend noticed something in the sky. she said look! it looks like a shooting star but it's moving in a zigzag. i've seen meteors before and this was definitely not a meteor. it never changed speed nor did it get brighter or dimmer in color. it stayed solid white and moved from south 40° off gulf coast northward in a straight line but occasionally zigzaged from left to right at about 45° turns til we lost sight at about 40° off of the northern horizon due to city lights. red orb sightings lasted about 1 minute on each orb and the last white star like object lasted about 7-10 minutes.
content.summary: 2 red orbs and 1 star like orb moving in zigzag formation

content.detailedDescription: I looked up to the night sky at 9 13 pm on august 25 and noticed what looked just like a star but it was moving fast and straight.  the light did not flash like the planes in the area did so i ran to the house to get my wife to come have a look.  she agreed that it didnt reemnle a shooting star, or an airplane and that it was very high in the sky just like a star i tried to get video of it but the objext couldnt be seen in the footage.  its flight path was east for about 30 seconds then it stopped moving east and seemed to lose elevation but still quite high like a star.  then it continued east faster than before until it dissappeared from sight
content.summary: Saw starlike light moving east very high in sky seemed higher than planes in area.  got my wife to come see it, it went straight east then seemed to slow or stop, losing elevation then continued east faster than before dissappearing from sight.
Like a pyramid flying type ufo. my brother was filming birds flying over head. he didn't notice it being in the lends while filming bird. the flying object was north west of bird by clouds

content.detailedDescription: On august 28, 2017, my girlfriend was sitting on the front porch and called my name out, claiming there was and unidentified object in the sky. i walked into the front porch, and seen a black orb-like spot in the sky. we were unable to determine the distance, due to the frame of reference up in the sky against clouds. for what seemed like four additional minutes, the object remained "floating".. and then unexpectantly, the object descended approximately 15 degrees exactly downward...It stopped for two seconds, and then appeared to go back up about 15% along the original line of descent. it stopped approximately two seconds again at the new apex, before starting another descent along the same original downward plane. the object descended extremely quickly, abnormally from any known aerial object. we lost track of the object as it disappeared from our line of site behind the house across the street. i tried to relocate the object using sight lines between the houses, but was unable to locate it. our neighborhood is generally a quite place, and we have no problem hearing audio of planes, helicopters, trains, but in this case, there were absolutely no sounds associated with the object. two civilian passenger airplanes  appeared through the clouds on opposite sides (east and west) about three minutes after the object descended. these planes were emitting normal looking exhaust, with a slight chem-trail lasting about five seconds behind the flight path. we are hoping other people in the west side of columbus, ohio happened to also see this object and have any explanations.
content.summary: Object hovered for 10 minutes, then desended
